.. _examples:

========
Examples
========

List of examples
----------------

When downloading from ``git-hub`` repository you can find the examples listed below in the folder ``examples``. These examples should provide an overview of how and for what ``RegPy`` might be used.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   notebooks/volterra_main_example
   notebooks/deconvolution_GD_methods
   notebooks/medium_scattering
   notebooks/parallel_mri
   notebooks/potential
   notebooks/tfm
   notebooks/diffusion_coefficient
